title: ISO organizational chart
snippet: Organization of ISO/TC 323. Solid lines represent the organizational flows from ISO. Dashed lines depict information flows or feedback on the standards documents back to ISO. ASTM, while a separate organization from ISO, still collaborates with ISO and offers feedback on ISO standards. See below for
